name: seattle
description: Our Seattle roll is a makizushi roll similar to the California roll. It  contains cucumber, avocado, raw Pacific salmon, and masago. All sorts of flavour combinations for the beginner to the sushi expert.
headline: Contains cucumber, avocado, raw Pacific salmon, and masago +  includes smoked salmon, and cream cheese.

name: philly
description: Philadelphia roll is a makizushi (also classified as a kawarizushi) a type of sushi made with smoked salmon, cream cheese, and cucumber. It  also includes avocado, scallions, and sesame seed.
headline: Our Crispy Rolls are served with your choice of spicy light mayo, soy, and sesame sauce.

name: lobster tempura
description: Crispy Fried Lobster with Avocado, topped with Masago and Special Sauce.
headline: Large rolls cut into five pieces with lobster, crab, mango, avocado, spicy light, light mayo, lettuce, lemon, sesame, and rice paper.

name: cali
description: The main wrapped ingredients are the avocado,crab meat and mayonnaise wrapped with seaweed. The inside-out roll is sprinkled on the outside with sesame seeds.
headline: Crab, Avocado, + Cucumber. Beautiful simplicity.

name: rainbow
description: The rainbow roll takes it one step further by adding raw tuna, salmon, shrimp, and white fish.
headline: California Roll but topped with Tuna, Salmon, White Fish, Avocado and Shrimp.

name: spicy tuna
description: The Spicy tuna roll is a makizushi roll that  contains raw tuna, and spicy mayo. The roll is seasoned with Ichimi togarashi (ground Red chile powder).
headline: Tuna and Green Onion in Spicy Sauce.

name: dragon
description: Our dragon roll sushi is made of shrimp tempura and cucumber which are tucked inside the nori and with thinly avocado slices which are layered on top of the sushi roll. The main reason for the name of dragon roll sushi is when it’s sliced, the artistically arranged sushi resembles the scales of a dragon.
headline: Fried Jumbo Shrimp, Avocado, Green Onion, Masago and Spicy-Mayo.

name: cucumber
description: Veggie delight with cucumbers and avocado rolled in rice.
headline: Small rolls containing two ingredients.  Simple and delicious.

name: boston
description: Our Boston Rolls are filled with creamy avocado, poached shrimp, and crunchy cucumber, then rolled in nori seaweed sheet and sushi rice.
headline: shrimp, kanikama, cucumber, lettuce, light mayo, red masago, sesame

name: alaskan
description: This is a roll with the rice inside rather than outside. These are stuffed with smoked salmon, crab, and avocado.
headline: The combination of salmon, crab, rice, and avocado is usually a winning and delicious mixture.

name: teriyaki
description: A delicious mixture of sweet, sticky teriyaki chicken, crunchy cucumber and perfectly seasoned rice. The topping with soft avocado adds a real twist to the texture and flavour of this sushi roll.
headline: Marinated boneless chicken topped with Teriyaki Sauce beautifully rolled.

name: shrimp tempura
description: This is a crunchy and savory sushi roll made with baked and battered shrimp, sushi rice, nori, cucumber, and avocado. A little tobiko and Unagi Sushi Sauce as the garnish spruce it up and give each piece a little tang to balance the flavors.
headline: shrimp tempura, avocado, cucumber, orange masago, spicy light mayo, sesame

name: spider
description: This roll is a type of makizushi sushi that includes breaded soft-shell crab and other ingredients such as cucumber, avocado,lettuce, and spicy mayonnaise, rolled inside nori and sushi rice.
headline: shrimp tempura, avocado, cucumber, orange masago, spicy light mayo, sesame

name: hawaiian
description: The shrimp, crab, and cucumber are inside, with seared ahi & avocado outside, drizzled with sweet mandarin sauce, topped with tempura crunchies, scallions, and kuro goma (sesame seed).
headline: Like a California roll but with a twist - it's star ingredients are shrimp and mango.

name: tuna
description: Our Tuna roll (Tekka maki) is simply a raw tuna sushi roll. It’s a classic hosomaki with the nori seaweed on the outside + it only has a few ingredients, including whole slices of lean tuna.
headline: Simple and elegant - not bathed in sauce, fried, or stuffed with ingredients.
